src:
Manuver NasDem: Taaruf Politik ke PKS, Kasih Panggung Anies di Kongres
02 Nov 2019, 22:20 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Partai NasDem gencar melakukan manuver politik belakangan ini. NasDem menjajaki taaruf politik dengan PKS hingga akan memberikan panggung untuk Anies Baswedan di kongres.
Taaruf politik NasDem dan PKS ini terjalin setelah Surya Paloh dan Sohibul Iman bertemu. Rupanya Sohibul sempat melemparkan candaan ke Paloh mengenai koalisi NasDem dan PKS di Pilpres 2024.
"Tidak secara spesifik tapi dalam agenda kongres ada dua komisi yang bahas pemenang pemilu, pilkada tapi ada hal yang sebenarnya luput disampaikan ada bercandaan Pak Sohibul dalam pertemuan itu 'Bang Surya ini kalau NasDem dan PKS ini kalau bersatu kurang sedikit aja 20 persen, hahaha kita gantung di sana hahaha," kata Ketua DPP NasDem, Willy Aditya pada diskusi 'Mewarnai Pelukan Politik PKS dan Partai NasDem' di Kedai Sirih Merah, Kebon Sirih, Jakarta Pusat, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Pertemuan Paloh dan Sohibul itu menghasilkan tiga kesepakatan. Poin pertama, kedua partai saling menghargai posisi masing-masing partai sebagai oposisi dan berada di dalam pemerintahan Jokowi-Ma'ruf Amin.
"Ada tiga kesepakatan yang kita tanda tangani bersama. Yang pertama adalah menghormati posisi parpol masing-masing," kata dia.
text:
NasDem Maneuver: Political Expert in PKS, Anies Stage Love in Congress
02 Nov 2019, 22:20 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - The NasDem Party is intensively conducting political maneuvers lately. NasDem explored political expertise with PKS until it would provide a stage for Anies Baswedan at the congress.
NasDem and PKS political masters were established after Surya Paloh and Sohibul Iman met. Apparently Sohibul had cast a joke at Paloh about the NasDem and PKS coalition in the 2024 Presidential Election.
"Not specifically, but on the agenda of the congress there are two commissions discussing the winner of the election, the election but there are things that actually escaped being told by Pak Sohibul in the meeting 'Bang Surya. If NasDem and PKS are united 20 percent or less, our hahaha hang there hahaha, "Nasdem DPP Chairman Willy Aditya said in the discussion 'Coloring the Political Hugs of PKS and NasDem Party' at Kedai Sirih Merah, Kebon Sirih, Central Jakarta, Saturday (2/11/2019).
The meeting between Paloh and Sohibul resulted in three agreements. The first point, the two parties respect each other's position as an opposition and are in the government of Jokowi-Ma'ruf Amin.
"There are three agreements that we signed together. The first is respecting the position of each political party," he said.
